Race.SpecificTitle: PW Fantasy Sports -- Authorize Fantasy Sports Contests - Act 322, 2018
Race.SummaryText: PROPOSITION TO AUTHORIZE FANTASY SPORTS CONTESTS.
Race.FullText: Shall fantasy sports contests be permitted in the parish of Iberia?

Race.SpecificTitle: Sales Tax District No. 1 -- 3/4% S&U Tax - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Sales Tax District No. 1 Proposition
(Sales Tax)
Race.FullText: Shall Sales Tax District No. 1 of the Parish of Iberia, State of Louisiana (the "District"), consisting of the currently unincorporated areas of the Parish of Iberia, be authorized to levy and collect a tax of three-fourths of one percent (3/4%) (the "Tax") upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the District, all as defined by law (an estimated $3,350,000 reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, commencing January 1, 2019, with the avails and proceeds of the Tax (after paying reasonable and necessary costs and expenses of collecting and administering the Tax) to be dedicated and used for the purpose of constructing, improving and maintaining roads and streets within the District, including any improvements associated with said road and street projects?
